doc:
Shelley Fabares https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shelley_Fabares 0 Michele Ann Marie "Shelley" Fabares (; born January 19, 1944) is an American actress and singer. She is best known for her roles as Donna Reed's daughter Mary Stone on The Donna Reed Show (1958–63) and as Hayden Fox's love interest (and eventual wife) Christine Armstrong on the sitcom Coach (1989–97). She was Elvis Presley's co-star in three films. In 1962, her recording of "Johnny Angel" reached number one on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. Michele_Ann_Marie_"_Shelley_"_Fabares ( ; born January_19_,_1944 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer . She is_best_known for her_roles as Donna_Reed 's_daughter_Mary_Stone on The_Donna_Reed_Show_(_1958 – 63_) and as Hayden_Fox 's_love_interest_(_and_eventual_wife_)_Christine_Armstrong on the_sitcom Coach (_1989 – 97_) . She was Elvis_Presley 's_co-star in three_films . In 1962 , her_recording of "_Johnny_Angel " reached number_one on the_Billboard_Hot_100_chart .
